title: 有人知道如何让花生壳和BungeeCord同时存在并开服吗？
author: RayRayRay
txt_content:
本帖最后由 RayRayRay 于 2014-12-22 20:21 编辑 

复制代码如题

问题表现：
我的花生壳域名是dreamcenter.vicp.cc
我手动设置了端口映射（不是花生壳的）要是不用bungeecord都可以连进来
连进来的话只要打那个域名，然后问题就是我用了bungeecord后，他们输入那个域名进不来，会卡在登陆那里，后台显示Serverconnector=Lobby has connected然后没事发生


Craftbukkit的Server.properties

#Minecraft server properties
#Sun Dec 07 17:11:33 CST 2014
generator-settings=
op-permission-level=100
allow-nether=true
level-name=world
enable-query=false
allow-flight=false
announce-player-achievements=true
server-port=25566
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-rcon=false
force-gamemode=false
level-seed=
server-ip=
max-build-height=256
spawn-npcs=true
white-list=false
spawn-animals=true
hardcore=false
snooper-enabled=true
online-mode=false
resource-pack=
pvp=true
difficulty=1
enable-command-block=true
server-name=Unknown Server
gamemode=0
player-idle-timeout=0
max-players=20
spawn-monsters=true
generate-structures=true
view-distance=10
spawn-protection=16
motd=A Minecraft Server

Bungeecord的配置文件
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
player_limit: -1
stats: b8bb7226-12ec-4edc-87c5-0ef6ba776239
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
listeners:
- max_players: 1
  fallback_server: lobby
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  bind_local_address: true
  ping_passthrough: false
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  default_server: lobby
  forced_hosts:
    localhost: lobby
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  query_enabled: false
  query_port: 25565
timeout: 0
connection_throttle: 4000
servers:
  lobby:
    address: localhost:25566
    restricted: false
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
ip_forward: false
online_mode: false
